page.title: 19My House in Ilford.
page.content: My house is an average sized house for the area. Downstairs is a front room and a back room. In the front room, there is an open fireplace, a settee and a{television. In the back room, we have another settee and another television. This room is where my sister, brother and I take our friends when they come round. We also have an extended{kitchen.}In the kitchen, we have a table where we have our dinner, a freezer, a fridge and cupboards. Upstairs, we have a toilet, sink, bath and shower in the{bathroom.}We also have two{bedrooms;}on is my mum and dad's and the other is my brother's. In our house, we have an extended loft with two bedrooms for my sister and myself. Katie Halpin 4C. ** Loxford High School. **
